scripts.test:quiet: bun test > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo '✅ Tests passed' || echo '❌ Tests failed'
scripts.docs:deps-graph:architecture: tsg --tsconfig ../../tsconfig.typescript-graph.json --LR --abstraction packages/cli --abstraction packages/action --abstraction src/domain --abstraction src/application --abstraction src/infrastructure --md ../../docs/reports/dependencies/core-architecture.md
scripts.docs:deps-graph: bun run docs:deps-graph:detail && bun run docs:deps-graph:architecture
scripts.ci: bun run fix && bun run check && bun run build && bun run typecheck && bun run test:quiet
